introTXT:
Now you will do a few demo trials to get accustomed to the cues.

Press 'y' to continue.

Now you will do a few practice trials to get accustomed to the task.

The practice trials are identical to what you just did except for two changes.

First, the task is a bit faster paced.

Second, after you see the rectangle image telling you which item is more likely to be tested, a new image will briefly flash at the center of the screen. This item is irrelevant to your memory task and can be ignored.

Press 'y' to continue.

Now you are ready to start the experiment! Try your hardest and remember to focus on the center of the screen. 

There will be ten 5-minute blocks, with a short break between each.

Press 'y' to begin.
